title: Trouble in Game with responsiveness SINCE 7.9 PATCH update.
body: After 7.9 hit i played a few games then all of a sudden i started getting these forms of packet loss spikes that are not packet loss. My ping, FPS and packet loss is fine yet in game every few clicks/ abilities used are unresponsive and 2 or 3 seconds later my champ reacts, it is the same feeling as packet loss but it is not packet loss. I repaired my client 3 times, tried to change my D.N.S, i reinstalled the game and it is still doing it, please help me with solutions the game is unplayable for me at the moment and i don't know how to fix it.****

replies.body:
> [{quoted}](name=Toreba,realm=EUW,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=HsafLrnU,comment-id=,timestamp=2017-05-05T16:26:36.024+0000)
>
> After 7.9 hit i played a few games then all of a sudden i started getting these forms of packet loss spikes that are not packet loss. My ping, FPS and packet loss is fine yet in game every few clicks/ abilities used are unresponsive and 2 or 3 seconds later my champ reacts, it is the same feeling as packet loss but it is not packet loss. I repaired my client 3 times, tried to change my D.N.S, i reinstalled the game and it is still doing it, please help me with solutions the game is unplayable for me at the moment and i don&#039;t know how to fix it.****

I have had the same issue quite a bit recently and it ended up being 9% packet loss that was occurring. How many tests for packet loss did you do? Some of mine would show up as fine with 100% of packets making it while others did show the packet loss.

This is a really strange issue! The symptoms definitely sound like packet loss, I'm curious why it might be otherwise?  Are you on a mac or pc?  Run a [log reader](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/209765743-Connection-Troubleshooting-Log-Reader) to get an analysis and find out for sure.  Let me know what you find.
